chunks.zh: 上周五美股亏了 20w 怎么办？
chunks.en: Lost 200k in US stocks last Friday, what to do?

chunks.zh: 上周五美股大跌，之前全仓买了小盘股，想着长拿一段时间。
chunks.en: US stocks plummeted last Friday. I previously bought small-cap stocks with all my funds, planning to hold them for a while.

chunks.zh: 没想到小盘股暴跌了三四天，一直忍着，没想到周五暴跌，害怕市场继续暴跌下去，割肉了，亏死了。
chunks.en: Unexpectedly, small-cap stocks crashed for three or four days. I kept enduring it, but didn't expect the crash on Friday. I was afraid the market would continue to plummet, so I cut my losses, and lost a lot of money.

chunks.zh: 想问问大家，交易亏钱了，总是影响心态，感觉自己是不是不适合做交易😔？
chunks.en: I want to ask everyone, losing money in trading always affects my mentality. I'm starting to feel like I'm not suitable for trading 😔?

chunks.zh: 怎么办啊。
chunks.en: What should I do?

chunks.zh: 全仓 小盘股 长拿一段时间这几个词是怎么放到一起的
chunks.en: How are the words 'all in', 'small-cap stocks', and 'hold for a long time' used together?

chunks.zh: 不适合就别做了呗，买点指数装死不看可能效果更佳
chunks.en: If you're not suitable, then don't do it. Buying some index funds and ignoring them might be more effective.

chunks.zh: @csys X 上不是有很多人推小盘股嘛，类似 hims 之类的。
chunks.en: @csys Aren't there many people on X recommending small-cap stocks, like hims and others?

chunks.zh: 是不是 v 站看多了，每个讨论理财的下面都是无脑买美股的
chunks.en: Have you been spending too much time on V2EX? Every thread discussing finance is just about blindly buying US stocks.

chunks.zh: 小盘股我也是割肉的
chunks.en: I also cut my losses on small-cap stocks.

chunks.zh: 别看 年底再看
chunks.en: Don't look at it, check again at the end of the year.

chunks.zh: 认亏
chunks.en: Admit the loss.

chunks.zh: 是的，你不适合做交易20w 如果只是人民币价值的话，更说明不适合。
chunks.en: Yes, you are not suitable for trading. If 200k is just the value in RMB, that further proves it.

chunks.zh: 亏的刚好是你的 1/100...没割肉, 还打算加仓
chunks.en: The loss is exactly 1/100th of yours... I haven't cut my losses and plan to buy more.

chunks.zh: 赌徒炒股方式
chunks.en: Gambler's way of stock trading.

chunks.zh: 拿着
chunks.en: Hold on.

chunks.zh: 想赚多少就要能接受亏多少，所以我后面没再尝试过这些可能亏很多的理财了
chunks.en: You have to be able to accept how much you can lose to earn how much you want, so I haven't tried financial plans that may lose a lot afterwards.

chunks.zh: 总是影响心态，感觉自己是不是不适合做交易😔？---大家(普通人)都是这样。
chunks.en: Always affects mentality, feeling that you are not suitable for trading 😔? --- Everyone (ordinary people) is like this.

chunks.zh: 建议你自己好好想想怎么操作吧，听别人的建议后面大概率会更后悔。
chunks.en: I suggest you think carefully about how to operate, listening to other people's advice is likely to regret it later.

chunks.zh: @ulala 指数也会跌啊，你不能判断现在是熊市还是牛市。
chunks.en: @ulala Indexes also fall. You can't judge whether it's a bear market or a bull market right now.

chunks.zh: 上去之后，不确定的太多了，通胀又起来了
chunks.en: After going up, there are too many uncertainties and inflation is rising again.

chunks.zh: @565656 万一年底跌没了了？
chunks.en: @565656 What if it drops to zero by the end of the year?

chunks.zh: 就像因特尔 2022 到 2024 年一直跌。
chunks.en: Like Intel, which kept falling from 2022 to 2024.

chunks.zh: @dji38838c 是的，我也觉得，20w 人民币
chunks.en: @dji38838c Yes, I think so too, 200k RMB.

chunks.zh: @NoirStrike 有 50%了
chunks.en: @NoirStrike There is 50%.

chunks.zh: @Donahue 接受不了啊，亏了心态不好，很容易崩溃。
chunks.en: @Donahue I can't accept it, losing money makes me feel bad and easily leads to a breakdown.

chunks.zh: 拿长线也跟普通人一样，拿不住。
chunks.en: Holding long-term is the same for ordinary people, they can't hold.

chunks.zh: 我之前买毛票，小盘股和中概股，亏得一塌糊涂，100 多个进去，现在怕是不剩多少了，一些票都退市了，我反正在装死
chunks.en: I used to buy penny stocks, small-cap stocks, and Chinese concept stocks, losing a lot of money. I put in over 100k , I'm afraid there's not much left now, some stocks have even been delisted, I'm just pretending to be dead.

chunks.zh: @ulala 2025 年交易，感觉比 2024 ，2023 ，难太多了，不确定性多。
chunks.en: @ulala Trading in 2025 feels much harder than in 2024 and 2023, with more uncertainties.

chunks.zh: 美股大起大落。
chunks.en: US stocks fluctuate greatly.
